QuestData.Title: Operation Recombobulation
QuestData.Description: I should go back to Gnomeregan and continue researching a cure for irradiated gnomes.$B$BBut, I stayed behind in Kharanos because the town is my home and I wanted to help defend it from the Frostmane attacks. I've been working on maintaining and repairing the steam tanks.$B$BFor some reason, Frostmane scavengers have taken a liking to the gyromechanic gears I need to complete the repairs. They're all over the Frostmane Front to the southeast of town. Will you help me get those gears back?
QuestData.CompletionText: Those pilots can't wait to get back into their steam tanks and take to the field again. Let's not let them down.
QuestData.RewardText: These gyromechanic gears are perfect! These two tank pilots are well on their way to being back in the fight!
